text: Dughiar kamɨn, kɨ God ko mɨgɨa ghaze, “O God, nɨ nan God, nɨ Senbalat ko Tobia na gamizir arazim gɨnɨghnɨgh, ivezir kuram isɨ aning danɨngigh. Ezɨ uaghan akam inigha izir amizim Noadia ko akam inigha izir gumazir igharaziba, me atiatir nɨghnɨzibar na damuasava ami, kamaghɨn nɨ men arazim gɨnɨghnɨgh ivezir kuram isɨ me danɨngigh.”
